original_text: And all king Solomon's drinking vessels were of gold, and all the vessels of the house of the forest of Lebanon were of pure gold; none were of silver: it was nothing accounted of in the days of Solomon.
korean_text: 솔로몬 왕이 마시는 그릇은 다 금이요 레바논 나무 궁의 그릇들도 다 정금이라 은 기물이 없으니 솔로몬의 시대에 은을 귀히 여기지 아니함은

sentences.original_text: And all king Solomon's drinking vessels were of gold
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬 왕의 모든 술잔은 금으로 만들어졌으며

sentences.original_text: and all the vessels of the house of the forest of Lebanon
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 레바논 숲의 집에 있는 모든 그릇들도
